description: Each week, guests and hosts on NPR's Pop Culture Happy Hour share what's bringing them joy. This week: Ariana Grande hosting SNL, Jimmy Buffett’s album A1A and the movie Wicked Little Letters.
title: What's Making Us Happy: A guide to your weekend viewing and listening

description: Halloween and election night are right around the corner. Whether you're casting ballots or spells, add these public media podcast recommendations from the NPR One team to your playlist.
title: From political change to spooky traditions, check out these new podcasts

description: To mark the 150th anniversary of the maverick American composer’s birth, pianist Jeremy Denk releases an Ives tribute album that educates, delights and confounds.
title: Charles Ives’ vision of America still strikes an unsettling chord

description: What does the death of Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar mean for the war in Gaza and the region beyond, and will it revive the chances of cease-fire and the release of the remaining hostages?
title: What does Yahya Sinwar's death mean for the Middle East?

description: "Severe child food poverty" is on the rise, affecting 181 million young kids. Here's how families cope when their kids are hungry and they can't afford to put 3 nutritious meals a day on the table.
title: PHOTOS: How 9 families cope when they can't afford 3 healthy meals a day for the kids

description: "Severe child food poverty" is on the rise, affecting 181 million young kids. Here's how families cope when their kids are hungry and they can't afford to put 3 nutritious meals a day on the table.
title: PHOTOS: How 9 families cope when they can't afford 3 healthy meals a day for the kids

description: Mortgage rates are ticking up even after the Federal Reserve has started cutting interest rates. Here's why, and where rates — and home sales — could go from here.
title: Mortgage rates were supposed to come down. Instead, they're rising. Here's why

description: A new concept album from the creator of Hamilton sets a cult classic film to a starry hiphop, rock and Broadway soundtrack.
title: Lin-Manuel Miranda's new musical is based on a cult movie — and is for your ears only

description: An Israeli company may have taken a huge step forward in the quest for a vegan cheese with the taste and texture of the real thing.
title: Vegan cheese doesn't melt like the real deal. That could soon change

description: A former Olympic snowboarder for Canada has been charged with running a drug trafficking ring that shipped vast amounts of cocaine across the Americas and killed four people, authorities said.
title: A Canadian former Olympic snowboarder is wanted in a U.S. drug trafficking case

description: Some election locations in Arizona are shutting their doors in the face of security threats — but others are expanding their footprint.
title: Barbed wire, high fences: some election spots in Arizona close, but others step up

description: This election cycle, AI-generated images have proliferated on social media platforms after politically charged news events. They often spread partisan narratives rather than facts.
title: AI-generated images have become a new form of propaganda this election season

description: If you had any doubts, we can clear them up now. Emo music not only still exists — it's thriving.
title: Emo music not only still exists — it's thriving

description: If you've paid attention to incoming presidents and incoming pandas you can ace at least half of this week's quiz.
title: This week's news quiz has skeletons (though sadly not the political kind)
